Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Hit-J
Mod.Author: Slimebucket + Digixu
Mod.Description:
Version 2.0 of Hit-J is out! fixes for stutters, 400 more textures for magic and effects.
Magic and effect Textures! 4x size of base textures.
Includes textures for magic spells, items, and effects in GF summons.

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: V2.0 - Re work of mod to decrease stuttering, 400 textures added V1.0 - Initial Release
